text: La Venganza de Cucamonga is the sixth album by Cuca, a Mexican hard rock band originally from Guadalajara, Jalisco. After a long hiatus from recording, Cuca returned in 2015 with this, their sixth album. Guitarist Alex Otaola replaced Galo Ochoa. The album was recorded, mixed, and mastered by Arturo 2T Perales at Oigo Studios in Guadalajara. The album received a 2015 Latin Grammy nomination. Singles include: Arre Lulú, Más Daño, and En el Nombre del Rocanrol. == Track listing == # Hoy Sólo Quiero... - 3:39 # Caca Pop - 2:50 # En el Nombre del Rocanrol - 3:58 # Más Daño - 2:51 # Más Putas Que las Putas - 3:18 # La Tapatía - 4:27 # Arre Lulú - 3:10 # Mi Vieja - 2:55 # La Ladilla Humana - 2:58 # Mujer Come-Hombres - 2:51 # Zona VIP - 3:36 # Esto No Te Va a Doler - 3:08 # La Venganza de Cucamonga - 4:15 # Tengo el Tiempo - 5:21 == Personnel == * Jose Fors – Vocals * Carlos Avilez – Bass * Alex Otaola – Guitar * Ignacio Gonzalez – Drums * Alex Lora – Backing Vocals (Caca Pop) * Santiago Cumplido – Backing Vocals (Caca Pop) * Henry Renau – Backing Vocals (Vona VIP) * Cuca & Arturo 2T Perales – Producer == Singles and videos == * Arre Lulú * Más Daño Category:Mexican music Category:Hard rock albums
title: La Venganza de Cucamonga
